name: "Hoyle Board Games 2003" Quiz | Video Games | 20 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is not a opponent to choose from?
questions.explanation:
A dog.

	There is no dog to choose as an opponent, yet you can play AS a dog.  The dinosaur is named Marvin, the alien is named Roswell, and the parrot is Captain Scurvy.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a name of an opponent for you to choose?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	Actually, although there is an Elayne, it is spelled with a y, not an i.  The characters are Chloe, Elayne, Harley, Hedda, Jack, Jasper, Marvin, Rhett, Roswell, and Captain Scurvy.  Captain Scurvy is a parrot, Marvin is a T-Rex, Roswell is an alien, Harley is a bear, and the rest are all humans with different personalities.

questions.text: Mahjong Tiles: Which of the following is not a choice of design for Mahjong?
questions.explanation:
Duck.

	There is no duck design, although you could make your own design in the shape of a duck.  Traffic is a design with rows of tiles with tiles in them to look like cars.  The bat and comb designs look like bats and combs, of course!

questions.text: Gravity Tiles: Which of the following is not a color tile in Gravity Tiles?
questions.explanation:
Orange.

	Colors include blue, yellow, green, red, and purple.  On easy level, you have yellow, green, and purple.  Medium adds blue to the mix, and hard adds red to make for an extremely challenging game!

questions.text: DoubleCross: Which of the following is not a bonus square?
questions.explanation:
Lose all points.

	Although you can lose points, you can never lose ALL your points.  Once you use the bonus tile for adding five to your score, the amount added each time increases.

questions.text: Word Yacht: What is the longest word you can make out of the letters 'beeeinlurv'?
questions.explanation:
unbeliever.

	Many words can be spelled out of these letters, but unbeliever is the longest.  When you make a 7 or 8 letter word, people clap.  When you make a 9 letter word, they clap louder.  When you make a 10 letter word, you get the biggest uproar imaginable.

questions.text: Wordox: How many squares are on the board for Wordox?
questions.explanation:
One hundred sixty-nine.

	Each row has 13 boxes.  20 of these 169 boxes are orange, and 8 of them are purple.  This makes the other 141 squares regular, except for the starred square in the center of the board.

questions.text: Reversi: How many squares are on this board?
questions.explanation:
Sixty-four.

	Reversi is a game with simple rules, but can be quite a challenge.  The goal is to end with more tokens then your opponent at the end of the game.  You can put a token anywhere on the board next to a line of your opponent's tokens, to capture those tokens as your own, but you must have one of your tokens at the end of the line of your opponent's tokens in order to take them.

questions.text: Backgammon: How many tokens are on the board at the beginning of the game?
questions.explanation:
Thirty.

	Each person has fifteen to begin with.  You can choose your color, either brown or white.  The object of this game is to get all your tokens in your home and into the pocket.

questions.text: Chess: Which is not a type of board for you to choose from?
questions.explanation:
Frogs.

	You can choose between a 3D version or a marble or wood 2D board.  You can only choose frogs during checkers.

questions.text: Chinese Checkers: Which is not a color to choose from?
questions.explanation:
White.

	There is no white in this Chinese Checkers.  The colors are cyan, green, purple, red, yellow, and blue.  You are randomly given a color to start the game, but if you would like to change it, go to settings.  From there you can choose what colors everybody plays and you can even change yourself to a different character from this screen.

questions.text: Master Match: Which of the following is not a color choice?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	There is no black.  You can choose to have any amount of colors up to eight.  The eight colors are green, blue, yellow, white, dark purple, red, light purple, and orange.

questions.text: Rummy Squares: What colors are the dice of this game?
questions.explanation:
None of these.

	Actually, there aren't any dice in this game.  The colors of the numbered tiles are red, green, blue, and yellow.

questions.text: Mancala: On the main screen, what color does the stone change to when hovering over it?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	The color starts purple.  When you hover over it to play it, the stone becomes pink.  Mancala uses only stones and a board.  There are no dice, cards, tiles, or anything of the sort.

questions.text: Battling Ships: Which of the following is not a length of a boat?
questions.explanation:
Five hundred ninety-two feet.

	The USS Nimitz is 1,092 feet long, the USS Iowa is 887 feet long, the USS Fletcher is 376 feet long, and the USS Ohio is 560 feet long.  Finally, the USS Seahawk is 199 feet long.

questions.text: Yacht: Which of the following is not a type of dice score?
questions.correct: Thirty-five bonus for top equalling sixty-three or more
questions.explanation:
Thirty-five bonus for top equalling sixty-three or more.

	Unlike regular yahtzee, you do not receive a 35 bonus for having the top score of at least 63.  The scores are ones, twos, threes, fours, fives, sixes, four of a kind, full house, small straight, large straight, yacht, and choice.

questions.text: Dominoes: How many points do you get in order to win?
questions.explanation:
One hundred.

	For Dominoes, you must get 100 points to win.  You can, however, alter it to get 200 or even 300 points before you win.  To do this, go into Dominoes settings, and you can choose on the page the difficulty and the amount to win.

questions.text: Checkers: When you are on the main screen and hover over Checkers, the chip turns black.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The chip for Checkers is black to begin with.  Therefore, it turns red when you are hovering over it.

questions.text: Parchisi: How many points does it take to get a piece out of your start?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	It only takes 5 to get out.  This can be rolling one five, or rolling something like a 3 and a 2 and adding them together to make 5.  The colors for the pieces of this game are the standard green, red, yellow, and blue.

questions.text: Bump 'Em: What color does the bumper car turn to when you hover over it in the main screen?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	For Bump 'Em, it begins red.  When hovering over to play it, it becomes yellow.  You can start with 2, 3, or 4 vehicles in pit row.
